Topic.Title: I still haven't got my dividend.
Dell Announces Intent to Acquire Datacenter Networking Leader Force10 Networks

Message.Title: mellanox stock long strong bullish today
Never Thought I'd Say It - DELL a Buy
Message.Msg: Yeah, I'll admit laughing when people paid $30 or $40 a share for DELL back then. Even if PC's stayed strong, you didn't have to be a rocket scientist to know there isn't a margin when anybody can slap together components or sell them. HP and Compaq had proven that. Now at $10#$%$ a deal. Nobody sells PC's any more. DELL has a monopoly! Whodah thunk it. I just took a position.

Topic.Title: Sell DELL with less thatn 20% to PPS target ... buy CIG with over 70% to PPS target

Message.Msg: Is it worth hanging on to DELL that has only 17.50% upside left from current PPS of $10.00 to its median PPS target of $11.75 ... Won't it be better to sell DELL and buy CIG which is around $11 now and has more than 100% upside potential to its median PPS target of $22.22 ... May be its is a great time to switch from DELL to CIG ...
